name: fabwindow
description: Fabwindow is a simple window as modal or multiple with window manager

scripts.deploy: npm-run-all format ts-declaration test build buil:* doc:api doc:build
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:iife && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && ts-declaration
scripts.prepare: npm i && cd doc/ npm i
scripts.doc:api: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out website/docs/api lib/constant.ts lib/FabModal.ts lib/FabModalManager.ts
scripts.format: prettier --write *.json *.js *.md __tests__/**/*.test.js lib/**/*.ts website/**/*.tsx website/**/*.js website/**/**/**/*.md website/**/**/*.mdx

author: Fabien Winkler
